title: @Jaredan/Bioluminescence: Any thoughts on fleshing out dragons?
body:
Are the famed winged Dovah going to get any sort of fleshing out in terms of lore? Or are the Champions currently more important?

I'd certainly love to see a certain "Terror of Zaun" see some new idealization.

EDIT: In particular, I'd like to see this sort of thing happen to Ebonmaw.

http://imgur.com/uKlkzLq
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/RMnR5Jth-ebonmaw-the-terror-of-zaun

replies.body: Yes! The Terror of Zaun might even get some development! In my opinion, one of the coolest dragons out there.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=v3aAxIr9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-29T15:47:15.882+0000)
>
> Did someone said "Terror of Zaun"?

It's your calling Ebonmaw. After they took you off the Treeline, it's time for you to shine!

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=v3aAxIr9,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-29T07:46:23.621+0000)
>
> Are the famed winged Dovah going to get any sort of fleshing out in terms of lore? Or are the Champions currently more important?
> 
> I'd certainly love to see a certain "Terror of Zaun" see some new idealization.

Ok, so I shouldn't really reply here, but this thread sits like a giant question-mark on the Story and Art board, poking me :/  As you might imagine, I can't say whether or not there's going to be any specific dates by which we might see more dragon-related stuff - because if we did have anything in the planning phase, then it's [Sod's Law](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sod's_law) that it would get changed or delayed or cancelled as soon as I said anything about it.  If we did.  Have anything on the horizon, I mean.

Okay, then to ask you specifically, what would you like to see in terms of dragons in League's future lore? Anything that could relate to Skyrim? Or would you want them going in a different direction like, say, Dark Souls or Warcraft?

No specific dates or anything like that. Just content in general.

Dear god... if they made a dragon as sadistic and intelligent as Ridley, I would flip. You just can't compete with a gosh darn _space_ dragon, which sounds so silly it wraps right back around to awesome.

> Kill as much as you want! Have fun!

Not just a space dragon,by Metroid Prime 3,he essentially became a space pirate alien pterodactylus cyborg mutant dragon(some also argue you could see him as a zombie since he's been revived and you could see him as a ninja because he has demonstrated some sneaking skills,but those are arguable)!

Arguable? He had the ability to become briefly invisible, which is as ninja as you can get, and most iterations are claimed to be one and the same, so resurrection is a fairly reasonable assumption.

Ridley is the poster boy for Ninja Pirate Zombie Robot.

Overall what I'd like to know is if the dragon on the summoners rift is sentient?
I mean shyvanas dad was sentient and able to turn human,but the one on the rift simply seems like a beast to me.
So are all dragons sentient or only certain species?

Into which category would ebonmaw fall?
